name: PaintRGBA

arguments.name: origin
arguments.desc: Origin in world space as vector

arguments.name: red
arguments.desc: red color value, in range 0.0 to 1.0

arguments.name: green
arguments.desc: green color value, in range 0.0 to 1.0

arguments.name: blue
arguments.desc: blue color value, in range 0.0 to 1.0

arguments.name: alpha
arguments.desc: alpha channel value, in range 0.0 to 1.0

arguments.name: probability
arguments.desc: Dithering probability between zero and one, default is 1.0

description: Tint the color of objects within radius to custom RGBA color.
